text: Beduiny skazali: "My uverovali". Skazhi [, Mukhammad]: "Vy ne uverovali i lish' potomu govorite:"My predalis' [Allakhu]", chto vera vse yeshche ne voshla v vashi serdtsa. Yesli vy budete pokorny Allakhu i Yego Poslanniku, On niskol'ko ne umalit [vozdayaniya] za vashi deyaniya, ibo Allakh - proshchayushchiy, miloserdnyy
